# Continuing with R

---

### Textbooks
[Hands-on Programming in R](https://rstudio-education.github.io/hopr/) FREE online. May seem basic after this class.
  
[R for Data Science](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/index.html) FREE online! (used in this class). Ideal for coming out of this class.

[Advanced R](https://adv-r.hadley.nz) For **programming**

[Tidy Modeling with R](https://tmwr.org) For **modelling**

### Other things!

- [TidyTuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday) Weekly tidy data activities with new data
  
- [rweekly.org](https://rweekly.org) (one weekly email)

### Other useful packages

- Geospatial analysis with {sf} and {raster}
  
- Machine learning with {caret}
